title: Les Delices De Gigi
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Organic, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, Catering
description: A vegan/organic bakery/restaurant with gluten free options. Located in front of the library. Offers cupcakes, muffins, pies, cheesecakes, verrines, custom 3D cakes, fruit smoothies. Also open at lunch time. Cozy atmosphere. Serves brunch every Sunday. Holds cooking workshops for children age 3-12 every Wednesday from 2-3:30. Tuesdays, as early as 4pm, seniors are welcome for tea and a pastry. Inquire about free tasting events.
